description: This file defines a Flutter widget named SectionTitle, which displays a titled section with optional trailing widget, styled with padding and theme-based text styling.

classes.name: SectionTitle
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a section title with optional trailing widget, styled with padding and theme-based text styling.

methods.name: SectionTitle
methods.description: Constructor for the SectionTitle widget, requiring 'text' and optionally taking a 'trailing' widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget, creating a padded row with the section title text and optional trailing widget.
